statement.p: What is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements; round accordingly.

solution.p: The percent is the number in parentheses (0.9218). The increase is the amount less than 100. In this case that is \displaystyle{1}-{0.9218}={0.0782}. Converted to percent notation this is \displaystyle{100}{\left({0.0782}\right)}={7.82}\%.
